title: Liverpool's Ryan Kent receiving interest from Bristol City and Sheffield United
description: Bristol City and Sheffield United are interested in taking Liverpool winger Ryan Kent on loan, Sky Sports News understands.
content: Kent is back on Merseyside after cutting short his loan spell at Bundesliga side Freiburg.The 21-year-old, who signed a long-term contract at Liverpool in August, made only six appearances while in Germany.Kent featured heavily for Liverpool during pre-season and the club are keen for him to continue his development at a side in the Sky Bet Championship.He spent last season on loan at Championship side Barnsley, scoring three goals in 47 matches.
